package.name: acdk_xml
package.title: ACDK XML (acdk_xml)
package.shortdescription: acdk_xml contains some classes regarding XML, including a XML-serialisation.

package.description:
acdk_xml contains a class framework to parse XML and HTML files with a SAX or DOM Parser. It also validation, namespaces and XPath expressions.
The module org_xml contains the interface defintions following Java mapping of the %ref[SAX interface, http://www.saxproject.org/] (defined in %nsref[org::xml::sax] and the Java mapping of the DOM (Document Object Model) by the %ref[W3C, http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-2-Core/core.html] (defined in %nsref[org::w3c::dom]).
To make handling with DOM a little bit more comfortable the acdk enrich the original DOM interface with methods inspired by the %ref[dom4j, http://www.dom4j.org] Java library.
Currently two implementation for the SAX and DOM parsers are available:
The first is based on the %ref[expat, http://expat.sourceforge.net/] library (which is %ref[included, expat_copying] in acdk_xml). It is a lean SAX implementation and has also basic DOM support. It can be found in the namespace %nsref[acdk::xml::sax] and %nsref[acdk::xml::dom].
The better choice is the %ref[libxml2, http://xmlsoft.org/] implementation, which supports namespaces, DOM Reading and Writing, parsing XML and HTML. Access and manipulation to/of a DOM Tree is also possible via XPath expressions. The corresponding classes can be found in the namespace %nsref[acdk::xml::libxmldom].
A copy of the underlying libxml2 C library is in %ref[included, libxml_copying].
Sample code can be found in %ref[acdk_xml_man] and the unit tests %ref[acdk_xml_dom_LibXML_Test.cpp, tests_acdk_xml_dom_acdk_xml_dom_LibXML_Test_cpp].
acdk_xml also contains some basic object serialization to/from XML (%ref[acdk_xml_XMLObjectReaderWriter_man] and %cref[acdk::xml::XMLObjectWriter]);
